featured.text: Ali gladly agreed and waited to see if Nasreddin would again give him back two pots.
“I’m sorry, your pot has died,” said Nasreddin. “Died!” said Ali.
Why did Ali take Nasreddin’s words that his pot had a baby?
One week later Nasreddin asked Ali to lend him the pot again.
He believed in whatever Nasreddin said.

other.text: Nasreddin gave Ali an extra small pot in the beginning because .

definition.zh_def: 納斯雷丁，一位著名的中東民間故事角色，以其智慧和幽默感聞名。
definition.en_def: Nasreddin, a famous character in Middle Eastern folklore known for his wit and humor.
definition.example: Nasreddin's stories often teach valuable lessons through his clever antics.
